title: The Saint’s Magic Power is Omnipotent (WN) - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Cooking   Demons   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Glasses-wearing Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Herbalist   Knights   Level System   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Misunderstandings   Multiple Transported Individuals   Pharmacist   Politics   Saints   Secret Identity   Summoned Hero   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World
author: Tachibana Yuka   タチバナ   橘由華
description:
Sei, a 20 year old office worker, was summoned to a different world after finishing her overtime work. But the person who had summoned her looked at her face and said, “This is not the Saint”. Is this neglect play!?

Sei left the royal palace and concealed her saint title. She started working at a laboratory where she made potions and cosmetics. She used her magic to grant people’s requests and slowly people began suspecting that she was a saint…

Can Sei enjoy her slow dreamy different world life without her saint title being found out?!>
